title: Assessing factors critical to smart technology applications to mobile health care − the fgm-fahp approach
text: Existing smart technology applications to mobile health care face several challenges

title: Platform technologies for modern vaccine manufacturing
text: Certainly, processes will need optimization with modularization of different antigenic modules, but vaccine platform technologies provide flexibility and possibility for multi-product facilities
authors: Charlton Hume, Hayley K.; Lua, Linda H.L.

title: Internet-based surveillance systems for monitoring emerging infectious diseases
text: Future research needs to focus on how to use internet-based surveillance systems to complement existing systems
authors: Milinovich, Gabriel J; Williams, Gail M; Clements, Archie C A; Hu, Wenbiao

title: Smart home technology for telemedicine and emergency management
text:
Using wavelet technology to process sound signals, their system achieves good performance comparable to other systems using different monitoring technologies
 To properly introduce smart environment in telemedicine and emergency management, the fundamental technologies, potential applications, their evaluations, and future directions are presented in a sequential coherent perspective
 Innovation is important to improve the efficiency and effectiveness, and hence acceptance, of these systems

title: Applications of Next-Generation Sequencing Technologies to Diagnostic Virology
text: When implemented into virus-discovery methods based on shotgun sequencing, next-generation technologies greatly enhance turnaround time and sensitivity
authors: Barzon, Luisa; Lavezzo, Enrico; Militello, Valentina; Toppo, Stefano; Palù, Giorgio

title: Future Veterinary Diagnostics
text: Emerging technologies are rapidly being adapted to improve our ability to de-tect new etiological agents, to provide rapid, accurate diagnostic tests for previously difficult infections, and to develop new response-based paradigms for diagnostic testing
